4th (heart) chakra
For cultivation of the expression of love – both for ourselves and towards others The heart chakra is located at the dorsal spine behind the heart. It governs love, compassion, circulation and devotion. When off balance it can lead to over-loving, jealousy, abandonment, anger, loneliness and bitterness. Corresponding crystals: rose quartz, green jade, green tourmaline, peridot.

 

Application over the sternum in the heart to balance the heart chakra and feel joy, love, gratitude and compassion.

excerpt.rendered: Cultivate love, both of ourselves and towards others
